attributes.action: A General Election must be announced.
attributes.additional_details: Labour's Keir Starmer, Ed Davey, the leader of the Lib Dems, and the SNP have all called for a general election to be called immediately.
attributes.background: A General Election must be announced as many are suffering. With poverty at it's highest in history. Millions affected due to the skyrocketing energy prices. With poltical unstability we cannot allow another Prime Minster to be chosen by a party. The public have a right to choose their next PM.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
